site.title: Ikarov
site.footerDescription: Our understanding about the perfection of nature and its beneficial effect on preserving the beauty and health of the human body is decisive in our work.

series\/botanical-face-care.title: Botanical Face Care

series\/botanical-face-care\/winter-nour.title: Winter Nourishing Face Oil
series\/botanical-face-care\/winter-nour.description: The winter face oil is created by adding active ingredients to a blend of two plant oils–avocado and sunflower.

series\/botanical-hair-care.title: Botanical Hair Care

series\/botanical-hair-care\/soothing-fa.title: Soothing Face Oil
series\/botanical-hair-care\/soothing-fa.description: Special care for skin exposed to cold weather conditions. For all ages. The winter face oil is created by adding active ingredients to a blend of two plant oils – avocado and sunflower.
